description: This file contains build instructions and configuration directives for compiling the 'libgcc-initial' component within the OpenEmbedded cross toolchain, including dependencies, build options, patching commands, and installation steps.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Prepend step to set up include directories, create dummy headers, and modify build files to simulate non-threaded, non-shared libgcc build.

methods.name: do_configure:append
methods.description: Append step to modify makefile to use 'gthr-single.h' as the thread header.

methods.name: do_install:append
methods.description: Append step to create a symbolic link to 'libgcc_eh.a' pointing to 'libgcc.a'.
